iati-activity.title: Developing Southern Civil Society Advocacy
iati-activity.description: The GTF programme is a £5 million DFID funded programme over 5 years across 16 countries in Africa, Asia and Central America aiming to improve Accountability and Responsiveness of the duty bearers for an effective WASH delivery
